title: 为什么PlotSquared非op都说“you can't claim more plots.”
author: guaiMiao~
txt_content:
为什么PlotSquared非op都说“you can't claim more plots.”
然而如果plot home 却说没有地皮

replies.author: IFEN1993
replies.txt_content:
添加权限节点
plots.plot.x复制代码
可领取x块地皮

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: guaiMiao~
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-8-18 21:04
给过权限了嘛 plots.claim
给了        呀

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: guaiMiao~
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-8-18 21:05
那/2 auto呢
当然都给了

replies.author: IFEN1993
replies.txt_content: 应该是没有领取多个领地的权限

replies.author: guaiMiao~
replies.txt_content:
IFEN1993 发表于 2019-8-18 21:07
应该是没有领取多个领地的权限
一个都领不了啊

replies.author: guaiMiao~
replies.txt_content:
IFEN1993 发表于 2019-8-18 21:10
添加权限节点

可领取x块地皮
感谢感谢

replies.author: IFEN1993
replies.txt_content:
拿狙也爆头 发表于 2019-8-18 21:08
一个都领不了啊
因为这个数量权限节点是必须的。你加上试试吧，我之前也遇到过

replies.author: IFEN1993
replies.txt_content:

感谢感谢
